scripts.dev: run-pty % npx yarn dev:node % npx yarn dev:client % npx yarn dev:contracts
scripts.dev:client: npx yarn workspace client run dev
scripts.dev:node: npx yarn workspace contracts run devnode
scripts.dev:contracts: npx yarn workspace contracts run dev
scripts.link:mud: for i in node_modules/@latticexyz/*; do npx yarn link @latticexyz/$(basename $i); done
scripts.unlink:mud: for i in node_modules/@latticexyz/*; do npx yarn unlink @latticexyz/$(basename $i); done && npx yarn install --force
